original_title: Secrets of the Millennium: Vol. 4: Ancient Prophecies
overview: Part of the "Secrets of the Millennium" series and narrated by acclaimed actor Orson Welles, this documentary explores primordial predictions about earth and its inhabitants. Delving into whether Biblical passages prophesize the future of Israel, the coming Apocalypse and the return of Jesus Christ, this program also asks questions such as, Is humankind alone in the universe? Has earth been visited by aliens in the ancient past?
title: Secrets of the Millennium: Vol. 4: Ancient Prophecies
